General.Name: Emak S.p.A
General.Description: Emak S.p.A., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, and markets various products in the outdoor power equipment, pumps and high pressure water jetting, and components and accessories business areas. The company offers brush cutters, lawnmowers, garden tractors, chainsaws, tillers, motor hoes, and walking tractors for gardening, forestry, and small agricultural equipment under the Oleo-Mac, Efco, Bertolini, Nibbi, and Staub brands. It also provides centrifugal and diaphragm pumps for agriculture; piston pumps for the industrial sector; professional and semi-professional high-pressure washers, floor washing drying machines, and vacuum cleaners; and hydrodynamic units and urban cleaning machines under the Comet, HPP, Lemasa, PTC Waterjetting Equipment, PTC Urban Cleaning Equipment, and Lavor brands. In addition, the company offers lines and heads for brush-cutters; chainsaw accessories; pistols, valves, and nozzles for pressure cleaners and agricultural applications; precision farming sensors and computers; and seats and technical parts for tractors under the Tecomec, Geoline, Geoline Electronic, Mecline, Sabart, and Raico brands, as well as other third party brands. It serves customers through specialized dealers; and contractors directly, as well as through a network of distributors. The company has operations in Italy, rest of Europe, the Americas, Asia, Africa, and Oceania. Emak S.p.A. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bagnolo in Piano, Italy. Emak S.p.A. is a subsidiary of Yama S.p.A.
